summary:
• Global academic and working experience in International Business, Trade Promotion, Marketing and Operations.
• Highly motivated, goal-oriented and passionate about working in a rapid multicultural and challenging environment.
• Passionate about Business Development, International Business, Marketing.
• Polyglot. Fluent in Spanish, English, Mandarin Chinese, French, Russian and intermediate in Italian and Dutch.
• Bachelor in International Trade and Master degree in International Business. 
• High geographic academic and working exposure (6 countries) and global travel experience of over 42 countries.

projects.title: HULT Action Project Team sponsored by McMillan Doolittle
projects.description:
HULT Action Project Team sponsored by McMillan Doolittle, during which our team reported to senior management.

Credible Market Research Data in Mexico.
A retail consulting firm relies heavily on secondary, syndicated and primary market
research data for development of retail strategies for its clients. However,
secondary and syndicated data are not reliable in other geographic locations, such
as Mexico, and even primary research companies need to be carefully selected. For
this reason, we were asked to identify the most reliable sources of consumer
and retail industry data. The Action Project included the identification of key
secondary and syndicated data sources, as well as key primary research providers
in Mexico. Moreover, we verified with key noncompetitive consumer
companies on best-in-class data sources in Mexico, and compared key consumer
and market growth data collected from the various sources to evaluate the range of
differences and potential reliability or validity of data.

projects.title: Market Research & Analytics: Survey Design
projects.description:
Complete Survey Design.

1.	Backdrop to the study / context. Objectives / Research Questions.  
2.	Target audience for the survey study and target population for survey study. 
3.	Sampling approach and  data collection strategy and method.
4.	Proposed analyses with rationales for how the analysis would relate to the nature of data collected and the questions we looked for answers to.   
5.	Supplemented with an appropriate survey Instrument .

projects.title: Global Strategy Project: "SKF Bearings: Market Orientation Through Services"
projects.description:
Deep Analysis of the SKF Bearings Case.

Employed external environment analysis tools such as PEST, Porter's 5 Forces, Competitors Analysis, SWOT, as well as internal environment analysis such as 4 actions framework and value chain.

Analysed the implementation of customer oriented strategy, and Push and Pull strategy. In addition, insights and recommendations were given by the team.

projects.title: Sustainability Plan for the city of Amsterdam, Netherlands.
projects.description:
Sustainability Plan in the long-term for the city of Amsterdam, Netherlands.
Analysed current environment, analysed actual sustainability situation in the city. 
Analysed stakeholders, limitations, and effects of using green energy.
Proposed sustainable options through alternative energy 100% environmental-friendly for Amsterdam.
Proposed feasible and realistic solutions in order to tackle the main issue.

profile_positions.description:
AES International is a tech based international distributor, wholesaler and supply chain specialist with a focus on A-brand FMCG, Food & Non-Food. 
AES International is active in more than 65 countries.
We open markets others cannot reach.

We connect the world, we bring products together under the perfect conditions, we connect products to people in order to make their life more convenient and beautiful.

We are able to tackle every global logistical challenge. We have a stock capacity for more than 30,000 pallets. And we simplify the entire supply chain. We offer the best and fastest solutions in terms of quality, efficacy, safety an responsibility.
profile_positions.title: Senior Trade Support & Sales

profile_positions.description:
-Operations and Claim handling for mechanical breakdown insurance for different clients such as Honda, Toyota, Mercedes Benz, Fiat, Suzuki, Cazoo, among others. 
-Operations and Claim handling for disability, unemployment, and life insurance for different clients such as Santander consumer finance, RGA, Assicra, Creacasa, Pitagora. 
-Policy administration and contract handling for mechanical breakdown insurance, as well as for disability, unemployment, and life insurance. 
-Keeping contact with customers and intermediaries in relation to questions about policies, claims.
-Processing of policies, requests and cancellations. Processing data in intermediary administration. 
-Handling insurance related inquires via email and phone, for different schemes/products.
-Induct and train new hires.
profile_positions.title: Senior Operations & Customer Service Associate

profile_positions.description:
- Reported more than USD$ 30 million of effective business (sales) in 2019-2020 (Shrimp, banana, balsa wood, cocoa beans, coffee, fish, etc.) through all the commercial opportunities, B2B matchmaking, expos, and personalized agendas.
- Directed different events of exports promotion such as B2B matchmaking meetings, commercial missions and marketing campaigns for Ecuadorian products in the center and eastern region of China.
- Organized the participation of Ecuadorian exporters in the most important expos in eastern China (World Seafood Shanghai, China International Import Expo, Shanghai Private Label Fair, etc).
- Managed agendas for potential investors and buyers to Ecuador (Alibaba Group, iMotion Shanghai, etc).
- Performed market research & elaborated reports for entry of potential Ecuadorian products into the Chinese market.
- Proposed strategies to increase exports of goods & services, tourism and attraction of FDI to Ecuador.
profile_positions.title: Interim Officer at the Trade & Investment Commission of Ecuador in Shanghai - PRO ECUADOR

- Organized and executed events of promotion of exports such as B2B matchmaking meetings, commercial missions and marketing campaigns for Ecuadorian products in the center and eastern region of China.
- Organized the participation of Ecuadorian exporters in the most important commercial expos and fairs (HortiflorExpo Shanghai, ITB China, Shanghai International Fashion Accessories Expo, etc)

profile_positions.description: A retail consulting firm relies heavily on secondary, syndicated and primary market research data for development of retail strategies for its clients. However, secondary and syndicated data are not reliable in other geographic locations, such as Mexico, and even primary research companies need to be carefully selected. For this reason, consultants were asked to identify the most reliable sources of consumer and retail industry data. The Action Project included the identification of key secondary and syndicated data sources, as well as key primary research providers in Mexico. Moreover, we as a team of consultants, verified with key noncompetitive consumer companies on best-in-class data sources in Mexico, and compared key consumer and market growth data collected from the various sources to evaluate the range of differences and potential reliability or validity of data.
